roleset.name: to cry

example.name: intransitive
example.text: The Free French wore black arm bands , and when she sang `` J'ai deux amours '' [*T*-1] they wept .

roleset.note: VN updated by Julia, 10/2010. Member of Vncls breathe-40.1.2, marvel-31.3-3, nonverbal_expression-40.2.

example.name: Victoria's a jerk. both args.
example.text: Teddy wept big crocodile tears, and Victoria giggled.

predicate.note: Frames file for 'weep' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. Comparison with 'cry'.
